channel.title: tidytuesday on Yet Another Iteration
channel.description: Recent content in tidytuesday on Yet Another Iteration

item.title: TidyTuesday: Pizzas and Monsters
item.description: We learn from the masters, doing the math by ourselves, so, in this post we reproduce two data analysis from David Robinsonâ€™s #TidyTuesday screencasts, the first one about the horro movie ratings dataset where he uses a lasso regression to predict the ratings of a movie based on genre, cast and plot. The second is about a dataset of pizza ratings in NYC and other cities. There are goods data handling tricks using tidyverse in these analysis.
